A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't listen to folks complaining about this movie based on 'too much SJW' or 'ew feminism'\, because those additions are admirable and progressive; this is just a bad movie that disregards its pedigree\, throws away previous plot and character development often for a cheap laugh\, and while there are a few visually stunning moments and great action sequences\, they're a handful of ornaments hung from a broken skeleton of a plot draped in the cloak of Star Wars.
